overview:
Christian is a Managing Director of APEP and leads the firm’s “Clients and Products” team. The team’s responsibilities include the internal and external fundraising, customer relationship management, conceptualizing new investment products, marketing and information management and event planning and -organization. Christian joined APEP in 2001 with the aim to build the firm’s third party business. Prior to joining APEP, Christian gained almost a decade of professional experience in the areas asset management, investment banking and direct private equity.

He has a bachelors degree in Business Administration from the University of Regensburg, a DEA from the University of Paris-Dauphine and is a Certified EFFAS Financial Analyst.
